languages.text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their allies' attacks also remove {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: До следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативника{/g} атаки его союзников также снимают {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимости{/g} и наносят на {unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} больше.

traits.locale_text:
Until the Adept's next turn, their allies' attacks also remove clues and deal +<u>(Adept's INT bonus)</u> more damage.
The Adept does not gain insight for those attacks.

Until the Adept's next turn, their allies' attacks also remove exploits and deal +<u>Adept's INT bonus</u> more damage.
The Adept does not gain insight for those attacks.

Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their allies' attacks also remove {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Adept{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their allies' attacks also remove exploits and deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their allies' attacks also remove {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: До следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативника{/g} атаки его союзников также снимают {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимости{/g} и наносят на {unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} больше.
languages.original_text:
Until the Adept's next turn, their allies' attacks also remove exploits and deal +<u>Adept's INT bonus</u> more damage.
The Adept does not gain insight for those attacks.

traits.locale_text:
До следующего хода адепта атаки его союзников также снимают уязвимости и наносят на <u>бонус ИНТ адепта</u> урона больше.
Эти атаки не увеличивают интуицию адепта.

До следующего хода адепта атаки его союзников также снимают уязвимости и наносят на <u>бонус ИНТ адепта</u> урона больше.
Эти атаки не увеличивают интуицию адепта.

До следующего хода адепта атаки его союзников также снимают уязвимости и наносят на {unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} урона больше.
Эти атаки не увеличивают интуицию адепта.

languages.text: 在{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}之前，特工所有盟友的攻击也同样会移除{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果层数，造成{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus}点额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their allies' attacks also remove {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
在技师的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}之前，技师所有盟友的攻击也同样会移除“研究”效果层数，造成额外伤害，等同于<u>技师的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。
此类攻击不会让技师获得{g|Encyclopedia:Insight}洞察{/g}。

在技师的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}之前，技师所有盟友的攻击也同样会移除“研究”效果层数，造成额外伤害，等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus}。
此类攻击不会让技师获得{g|Encyclopedia:Insight}洞察{/g}。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、味方の攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}を取り除き、また{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus}増加する。
languages.original_text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their allies' attacks also remove {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
アデプトの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、味方の攻撃はエクスプロイトを取り除き、またダメージが<u>アデプトの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>分増加する。
アデプトはこれらの攻撃から{g|Encyclopedia:Insight}洞察力{/g}を獲得しない。

アデプトの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、味方の攻撃はエクスプロイトを取り除き、またダメージが{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus}分増加する。
アデプトはこれらの攻撃に{g|Encyclopedia:Insight}洞察力{/g}を獲得しない。

languages.text: Hasta el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g}, los ataques de sus aliados también eliminan {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidades{/g} e infligen +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.
languages.original_text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their allies' attacks also remove {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Hasta el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del adepto, los ataques de sus aliados también eliminan vulnerabilidades e infligen +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} del adepto</u> de daño adicional.
El adepto no gana {g|Encyclopedia:Insight}intuición{/g} con esos ataques.

Hasta el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del adepto, los ataques de sus aliados también eliminan vulnerabilidades e infligen +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} de daño adicional.
El adepto no gana {g|Encyclopedia:Insight}intuición{/g} con esos ataques.

languages.text: Bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agenten{/g} entfernen die Angriffe seiner Verbündeten auch {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzungen{/g} und verursachen +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their allies' attacks also remove {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Adepten entfernen die Angriffe seiner Verbündeten auch Ausnutzungen und verursachen +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Adepten</u> mehr Schaden.
Der Adept erhält keine {g|Encyclopedia:Insight}Einsicht{/g} für diese Angriffe.

Bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Adepten entfernen die Angriffe seiner Verbündeten auch Ausnutzungen und verursachen +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} mehr Schaden.
Der Adept erhält keine {g|Encyclopedia:Insight}Einsicht{/g} für diese Angriffe.

languages.text: Jusqu'au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g}, les attaques de ses alliés neutralisent les {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilités{/g} et infligent +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} en plus.
languages.original_text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their allies' attacks also remove {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Jusqu'au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'Adepte, les attaques de ses alliés neutralisent les exploits et infligent +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} de l'Adepte</u> points de dégâts en plus.
L'Adepte n'acquiert pas de {g|Encyclopedia:Insight}perspicacité{/g} pour ces attaques.

Jusqu'au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'Adepte, les attaques de ses alliés neutralisent les exploits et infligent +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} points de dégâts en plus.
L'Adepte n'acquiert pas de {g|Encyclopedia:Insight}perspicacité{/g} pour ces attaques.

Jusqu'au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Adepte{/g}, les attaques de ses alliés neutralisent les {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} et infligent +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} en plus.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Ajan{/g}'ın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} kadar dost birimlerin saldırıları da {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}sömürüleri{/g} kaldırır ve +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their allies' attacks also remove {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
